ValidationRule.description: If the NAICS code is blank and billing country is MX, then the NAICS code can be edited. Otherwise, NAICS code cannot be edited by AEs and ADRs.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"AE"),CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"ADR")), ISCHANGED(NAICS_Code__c), OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(BillingCountryCode, "MX")), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(NAICS_Code__c))), ISPICKVAL(BillingCountryCode, "MX") ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The NAICS Code field cannot be updated by AEs/ADRs.
